description technical detail:
Lenovo ThinkVision LT2223p - 21.5" Widescreen LED Monitor
ThinkVision LT2223p LCD monitor, its the mainstream monitor for users seeking that distinct viewing experience. Its elegant and minimalist design is complimented by its beautiful 21.5-inch FHD LED backlit panel. Packed with a USB hub, an array of connectivity options and Tiny PC support, LT2223p provides users the benefit of better manageability and a more streamlined user experience. It also adopts the ENERGY STAR 6.0, TUV Green Mark, EPEAT Gold, TCO Display 6.0, TCO Certified Edge 1.1, and UL Environment Gold; on top of this, it boasts lower energy consumption and lesser environmental impact.
